settings.text:
We currently only deliver to addresses in England, Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland, the Isle of Man and Channels Islands.

Shipping Rates:
FREE shipping on orders over £25
£3.50 shipping on orders under £25

Orders are shipped weekdays. Expect delivery within 2-5 days of placing your order.

For further support email hello@fitkitbodycare.com

Please contact customer services by email on hello@fitkitbodycare.com to let US know you would like to return something. We'll be able to arrange a refund for you. Please note that it can take up to 21 days to process a refund.

If you’ve changed your mind:
You can cancel your order and get a refund if you get in touch before it is shipped.

If your items have already shipped we are happy to refund the cost of unwanted products, as long as we receive them back at our returns address (see below) in their original, unopened state, within 14 working days of them being delivered to you.

Please note that we are not responsible for the return postage and recommend that you obtain a certificate of postage in case the parcel doesn’t reach us.

If something isn’t right:
If what we’ve sent you is wrong, faulty or damaged, we will refund the cost of the product and delivery.
Share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, make announcements, or welcome customers to your store.
